body: How to ensure that activities belonging to the same workflow can be prioritized and executed to avoid hunger when a batch of tasks is initiated for a workflow containing multiple activities.

comments.body: Depending on your application, you might consider using local activities for some of them. In general though, this isn't really possible right now. We're starting to work on related issues so we might have a better answer in a while.

title: How to ensure that activities belonging to the same workflow can be prioritized and executed to avoid hunger when a batch of tasks is initiated for a workflow containing multiple activities.
